{ PRIVATE EDUCATION
Mrs. Reist began educating her daughter when she reached school age in 1924. Shortly afterwards children from outlying farms joined the classes, but the school only had a few pupils at first. In 1933 Mrs. Reist moved to Heath House on High Street in Bolsover and the establishment became known as{Heath House School.}The lessons were only conducted in the mornings (9-1) and there were never more than 10 children at the school. The schoolroom was at the front of the house with one table for Juniors and another for Infants (age range of the school was 5-11). In 1944 the establishment was registered as a school, therefore school milk had to be provided and the school was open to inspection. The school closed in 1964.
